errorPage.title: An unexpected error occured
errorPage.message: Something went wrong. Refreshing the page might help.

404Page.pageNotFoundContent: Oh no, something went wrong. Click <lnk>here</lnk> to go back to the front page.

loginPage.pageText: Welcome to the TET-positions service. The service allows you to report and manage your organisation's TET-positions. Select below if you want to report a new TET-position as a representative of a private company or the City of Helsinki.
loginPage.companyLoginText: I am a representative for a private organisation
loginPage.cityLoginText: I am a representative for the City of Helsinki
loginPage.cityLoginButton: Log in for the City of Helsinki
loginPage.errorLabel: An unexpected error occurred. Please sign in again.
loginPage.sessionExpiredLabel: User session expired. Sign in again
loginPage.infoLabel: Using the service requires strong authentication
loginPage.logoutInfoContent: You have been logged out. If you want to continue to use the service, you have to log in again by clicking the button below.

infoContent.listHeading: The City of Helsinki will process the following necessary information before creating a TET position advertisement:
infoContent.bullet1: name of the person who filled in the application (to be retrieved from suomi.fi in connection with authentication)
infoContent.bullet2: name, telephone number and e-mail address of the contact person designated by you (to be entered in the service)
infoContent.bullet3: name, business ID and address of the employer organisation (to be entered in the service).
infoContent.moreInfo: More information on how personal data is processed (e.g. legal basis and retention periods) in the TET position advertisement service is available in the student administration register .
infoContent.registerRights1: The data subject has rights relating to personal data and its processing by the City of Helsinki.
infoContent.registerRights2: Among other things, the data subject may check what information has been collected about them. More information about the rights and their implementation can be found on the City of Helsinki’s data protection page.

application.createTerms: I am in a manager position or have discussed the announcement with my manager.

jobPostings.title: TET workplace advertisements
jobPostings.noPostingsFound: You do not have any TET advertisements yet.

editor.draftInfoContent: Fill <1>Job title</1>, <1>Unit or department</1> and <1>Address</1> to save draft of the TET advertisement

employerInfo.addressNeededLabel: The TET is carried out at a different address

posting.title: Job title
posting.workHoursNotice: The working hours are always the same (30 h per week).
posting.endDateHelperText: If the TET-position is continuously open, leave the end time blank

validation.email: Enter e-mail in the correct format
validation.max: The maximum number of characters is exceeded
validation.name: Enter the name without special characters or letters

imageUpload.label: Upload an image of a workplace or task by dragging it below
imageUpload.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the image?
imageUpload.deleteConfirmContent: The image will be completely removed from the notification. The function is irreversible.
imageUpload.photographerNameHelperText: If required by the image license, provide the photographer's name here. The name will appear below the image.
